00074 /*******************************************************************************
00075 **                       ENUMERATIONS                                         **
00076 *******************************************************************************/
00080 typedef enum FATFS005_ErrorCodesType
00081 {
00085   /*
00086   GROUPID  #19
00087   MODULENAME = Device Abstraction Layer App
00088   */
00089   /*
00090   ERRCODESTRING = FATFS005_ERROR
00091   STRCODESTRING = Error in SDMMC001 App.
00092   */
00093   FATFS005_ERROR = 1,
00097   /*
00098   GROUPID  #19
00099   MODULENAME = Device Abstraction Layer App
00100   */
00101   /*
00102   ERRCODESTRING = FATFS005_SDMMC002_ERROR
00103   STRCODESTRING = Error in Sdmmc Block Layer App. Error is propagated to FAT FS
00104   so is returned in FAT FS error format
00105   */
00106   FATFS005_SDMMC002_ERROR,
00113   /*
00114   ERRCODESTRING = FATFS005_FUNCTION_ENTRY
00115   STRCODESTRING = Function Entered %s
00116   */
00117   FATFS005_FUNCTION_ENTRY,
00121   /*
00122   ERRCODESTRING = FATFS005_FUNCTION_EXIT
00123   STRCODESTRING = Function Exited %s
00124   */
00125   FATFS005_FUNCTION_EXIT
00126 } FATFS005_ErrorCodesType;

00128 /*******************************************************************************
00129 **                      Global Variable Definitions                           **
00130 *******************************************************************************/
00134 typedef uint8_t (*InitializeFunc) (void);
00138 typedef uint8_t (*GetStatusFunc) (void);
00142 typedef uint32_t (*ReadBlkFunc) (uint8_t*, uint32_t, uint8_t);
00146 typedef uint32_t (*WriteBlkFunc)(const uint8_t*, uint32_t, uint8_t);
00150 typedef uint32_t (*IoctlFunc) (uint8_t, void * );
00151 /*******************************************************************************
00152 **                       STRUCTURES                                           **
00153 *******************************************************************************/
00158 typedef struct FATFS005_DeviceFuncType
00159 {
00163   InitializeFunc InitializePtr;
00167   GetStatusFunc GetStatusPtr;
00171   ReadBlkFunc ReadBlkPtr;
00175   WriteBlkFunc WriteBlkPtr;
00179   IoctlFunc IoctlPtr;
00180 } FATFS005_DeviceFuncType;
